==signInEmbedded==

Embeds the sign-in widget.

_Examples_

{{{
<janrain:signInEmbedded />
}}}

_Attributes_

  * `applicationDomain` (optional) - The Janrain application domain. E.g. !https://mydomain.rpxnow.com/
  * `tokenUrl` (optional) - The token url. E.g. http://mydomain.com/token
  * `defaultProvider` (optional) - The ..
  * `flags` (optional) - The ..
  * `languagePreference` (optional) - The ..
  * `width` (optional) - The ..
  * `height` (optional) - The ..


==signInLink==

Renders the sign-in link.

_Examples_

{{{
<janrain:signInLink>Sign In</janrain:signInLink>
}}}

_Attributes_

  * `applicationDomain` (optional) - The Janrain application domain. E.g. https://mydomain.rpxnow.com/
  * `tokenUrl` (optional) - The token url. E.g. http://mydomain.com/token
  * `style` (optional) - The ..
  * `styleClass` (optional) - The ..
